article_title: Teams compete in Zimmerman Memorial Fitness Challenge in Orono — State — Bangor Daily News — BDN Maine
article_text:
Ashley L. Conti | BDN

A team makes its way around the University of Maine mall with a weighted pack during the fifth annual 1st Lt. James R. Zimmerman Memorial Fitness Challenge at the University of Maine campus in Orono on Saturday. The event tests a four-person team's mental and physical toughness through a variety of tasks and obstacles. The Zimmerman Memorial Fitness Challenge was established in 2011 to honor and remember 1st Lt. James R. Zimmerman who was killed in combat in 2010. Buy Photo

article_summary:
The Zimmerman Memorial Fitness Challenge was established in 2011 to honor and remember 1st Lt. James R. Zimmerman who was killed in combat in 2010.
Ashley L. Conti | BDNA team makes its way around the University of Maine mall with a weighted pack during the fifth annual 1st Lt. James R. Zimmerman Memorial Fitness Challenge at the University of Maine campus in Orono on Saturday.
The event tests a four-person team's mental and physical toughness through a variety of tasks and obstacles.
